comments:
Using an implementation based on WTP 1.0 RC1, the following exception occurs after clicking Finish on the Web Service Client Test page preventing the generation of the sample JSPs:

Yen,
this error can only occur if webserviceutils.jar does not exist in eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.wst.ws.consumption_1.0.0. This is also very old code, and I've checked in my RC2 build from yesterday that webserviceutils.jar exists.

Would you please look in your installation's org.eclipse.wst.ws.consumption_1.0.0 plugin and let us know if webserviceutils.jar is there? If it isn't, did you by any change run against a development vs. build version of the consumption plugin? If so, webserviceutils.jar won't exist since it's an artifact of the plugin's Ant build process, which you could correct by generating and running the plugin's build.xml Ant script.

Thanks - CB.

I tried this with http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/committers/drops/S-1.0RC2-200512071540/, the webserviceutils.jar was copied, but I got into a complete hang of the Web service client wizard.  When I checked the local file directory, I can see the sample JSP and the webserviceutils.jar at the right place.  The symptom of this is very similar to 111456.

Kelvin
I have tried a patch from Chris Brealey on RC2. And it fixed the JSP hanging problem. The client seems to work now.
Added to Hot List at Yen Lu's request and setting priority to P2 in case this is reopened.
verified and real problem is already fixed in 119997

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old and since it is a dup, worksforme, invalid bug that its unlikely to still be useful or need further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error.
